mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lo_hang(ma_lo, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, ngay_san_xuat, han_su_dung, dung_tich, ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang) VALUES (#{maLo}, #{sysIdSanPham}, #{soLuong}, #{ngaySanXuat}, #{hanSuDung}, #{dungTich}, #{maChiTietKhuVuc}, #{sysIdChiTietNhapHang})
mapper.update: UPDATE lo_hang SET sys_id_san_pham=#{sysIdSanPham}, so_luong=#{soLuong}, ngay_san_xuat=#{ngaySanXuat}, han_su_dung=#{hanSuDung}, dung_tich=#{dungTich}, ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc=#{maChiTietKhuVuc}, sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang=#{sysIdChiTietNhapHang} WHERE ma_lo=#{maLo}
mapper.select: SELECT lh.*, sp.ten_san_pham FROM lo_hang lh INNER JOIN san_pham sp ON lh.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham;
SELECT lh.*, sp.ten_san_pham FROM lo_hang lh INNER JOIN san_pham sp ON lh.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham WHERE lh.ma_lo=#{maLo}

SELECT ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang, ct.ma_inbound, ct.ma_pr, ct.gia, ct.tong_chi_phi, po.ma_po, kh.ten_khach_hang, ncc.ten_nha_cung_cap, sp.ten_san_pham, sp.hinh_anh, tk.so_luong as so_luong_ton_kho, lh.ngay_san_xuat, lh.han_su_dung, lh.so_luong as so_luong_nhap, k.ten_kho, i.ngay_nhap, lh.ma_lo FROM chi_tiet_nhap_hang ct left JOIN san_pham sp ON ct.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham left JOIN khach_hang kh ON ct.sys_id_khach_hang = kh.sys_id_khach_hang left JOIN purchase_order po ON ct.ma_po = po.ma_po left JOIN lo_hang lh on ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang = lh.sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang left JOIN ton_kho tk on lh.ma_lo = tk.ma_lo left JOIN kho k on tk.ma_kho = k.ma_kho left JOIN nha_cung_cap ncc on ct.sys_id_nha_cung_cap = ncc.sys_id_nha_cung_cap left JOIN inbound i on ct.ma_inbound = i.ma_inbound WHERE lh.ma_lo = #{maLo};
